what: survstan: Fitting Survival Regression Models via Stan
title: survstan: Fitting Survival Regression Models via Stan
text: aim R package survstan provide toolkit fitting survival models using Stan. R package survstan can used fit right-censored survival data independent censoring. implemented models allow fitting survival data presence/absence covariates. inferential procedures currently based maximum likelihood (ML) approach.

title: survstan: Fitting Survival Regression Models via Stan
text: can install development version survstan GitHub :
